resources.string: You must choose the venue where you will be viewing the Death and the Powers Global Simulcast on February 16, 2014, and then click Submit/Continue. (required)
You must choose the venue where you will be viewing the Death and the Powers Global Simulcast on February 16, 2014, and then click Submit/Continue. (required)
Enter into The System by logging in with Facebook. You will not receive any Facebook notifications, and nothing will be posted to your Wall. Your likeness may be incorporated into the performance.
We’re downloading the latest Death and the Powers content for your device.
You must join a Wi-Fi network with Internet, and then click Continue / I’m Connected.
Connect to the "%s" network to begin your journey into The System.
If you are on a non-cellular device, please connect to a Wi-Fi network with Internet access.
Please connect to the Wi-Fi network provided by the venue, or ask an usher for help connecting your device.
Please connect to a Wi-Fi network with Internet access to proceed.
